text: Prthiraita aud'dhatya prakasa arau kutakausala aralambanara karane. Athaca kutakausale kerala tara udyoktasakalakahe paraibestana karaiba. Tente sihamte purbararti bilakara (darae allahara) bidhanara apeksa karai ache neki? Kintu tumi allahara pad'dhatita ketiya'o kono paraibartana napaba arau allahara pad'dhatira kono byatikramo dekhibalai napaba
